=== Plugin Name ===
Contributors: netinho
Tags: doctrine, orm
Requires at least: 3.0.0
Tested up to: 3.0.3
Stable tag: 0.3

This plugin enables Doctrine ORM 1.2.3 support in WordPress to easy development. You can get more information in Doctrine documentation.

== Description ==

This plugin enables Doctrine ORM 1.2.3 support in WordPress to easy development. You can get more information in Doctrine documentation.

== Changelog ==

= 0.3 =
* Choice to Doctrine load only in Admin area.
* Enabled support of Alternative PHP Cache (APC) and result cache lifespan. See it in Options on Admin.

= 0.2 =
* Make and organize as wordpress plugin.

= 0.1 =
* First version.
